data.title: Bump github/codeql-action from 4.31.9 to 4.32.0 in the github-actions group
[issue #441] fix(magic_enum): fix enum_integer return value deduction on unsupported compilers.
Bump the github-actions group across 1 directory with 4 updates
Fix redefinition errors when compiling as module (regression fix)
Bump the github-actions group with 2 updates
Bump the github-actions group across 1 directory with 3 updates
Fix MSVC C++20/23 module compatibility for static_str conversion operator
fix: add missing return type in FatalConditionHandler (catch.hpp) to fix compile error
Replace test option with not building tests by default
Bump the github-actions group with 2 updates
Bump the github-actions group with 2 updates
enum_name function now can receive a container of enum
Bump github/codeql-action from 3.29.2 to 3.29.5 in the github-actions group
Bump the github-actions group with 3 updates
fix: warnings about included file in module purview in MSVC
Fix __FUNCSIG__ parsing on x86 by explicitly declaring the calling convention
Bump the github-actions group with 3 updates
fix: use `inline` instead of `static` for constexpr in header file
Bump the github-actions group across 1 directory with 2 updates
More reliable value validness detection towards CWG1766
Bump the github-actions group across 1 directory with 2 updates
Support fmt and std::format in C++20 module
Bump github/codeql-action from 3.27.0 to 3.27.5 in the github-actions group
Bump the github-actions group with 4 updates
meson: install headers and pkg-config file
Bump github/codeql-action from 3.26.6 to 3.26.10 in the github-actions group
enum_flags_name: return name for 0, if it exists
Bump the github-actions group with 2 updates
Bump the github-actions group with 3 updates
Update comments regarding max and min
Parameterize formatter::format to use with FMT_COMPILE
Bump github/codeql-action from 3.25.7 to 3.25.11 in the github-actions group
Add better support for Yocto/PetaLinux in cmake file
chore: remove crlf line endings in bazel files
Bump the github-actions group with 2 updates
Add MAGIC_ENUM_USE_STD_MODULE option to use standard library module.
Bump the github-actions group with 2 updates
Bump the github-actions group with 1 update
Bump the github-actions group with 2 updates
Bump the github-actions group with 2 updates
Bump the github-actions group with 4 updates
CI: hash-pin sensitive workflow and configure dependabot to keep them updated
checking that the enum is valid (not empty and not forward declaration)
Fix undefined behavior (`get` is moved to `magic_enum::containers`)
Fix magic_enum::containers::set erase function for Clang compilers
fixes 'std::ptrdiff_t' to 'std::size_t' casting error and suppresses `-Wuseless-cast` warning for gcc and clang
Explicitly mark the result of detail::names as constexpr
Fix link to Conan in README
automatically create and upload bzlmod archive
add enum_flags_test and enum_flags_test_any functions for flags
Add gcc 12 and NONASCII flags to ubuntu build matrix.
Move NONASCII tests to their own file
add contains and any_flag_match functions for flags
allow special characters in enum, not only '_'
Fix std::forward variadic arguments in invoke_deoptimized()
ci: set minimal permissions on workflows
Fix forgotten reppacement in CPack packaging script
added -std=c++17 to flags so clangd would identify c++17 headers properly
Support ReSharper C++ builtins for type/enumerator name
Fix Clang 16 build in GitHub Actions
Update actions/checkout in GitHub Actions workflows to v3
Made a bit more compatible to Clang
Fix compilation error, when including magic_enum after windows.h
Magic enum format in a separated header file
Sparse only if have an element. Switch only if -.
Add support for the ROS build system
Remove constexpr find workaround with std::char_traits<char>::find
remove std:: from optionals to enable again MAGIC_ENUM_USING_ALIAS_OPTIONAL
Convert std::enable_if_t to static_assert for cleaner error message
change std::size_t to std::uintmax_t in fuse functions
Simplier change only one enum instance name
support gcc8 with defined MAGIC_ENUM_NO_CHECK_SUPPORT and with specialized magic_enum::customize::enum_name
Remove silent branch and duplicate checks
remove static assert for static string because it does not solve issue
Rgp static assert for static string
Add simple meson.build to make this repository as a subproject
Remove optional<> with std::decay (Mac OS / Xcode)
Fix underflow in out of range check
Add ability to include external configuration header
Add ARCH_INDEPENDENT so the generated cmake config files are really arch independent
chore: update catch2 to 2.13.4 for Apple Silicon support
Detect values out of range and fail compilation
Replace C-style cast with static_cast to suppress the warning
Change the way range_min()/max() is calculated
Fix regression of enum_cast<>() when used with refs (EnumT& vs EnumT)
